title: "STA 9715 - Applied Probability"

Welcome to the course website for STA 9715 (Fall 2024)!

STA 9715 is an _Applied Probability_ course targeted at students in the [MS in Business Analytics](https://zicklin.baruch.cuny.edu/academic-programs/graduate/ms/masters-in-business-analytics/), [MS in Statistics](https://zicklin.baruch.cuny.edu/academic-programs/graduate/ms/statistics/), and [MS in Quantitative Methods](https://zicklin.baruch.cuny.edu/academic-programs/graduate/ms/quantitative-methods-modeling/) programs. 

This site hosts the unofficial [Course Syllabus](./syllabus.html), 
[Course Policies](./resources.html), and [Course Learning Objectives](./objectives.html).
Official copies of these documents can be found on [CUNY Blackboard](https://brightspace.cuny.edu).
Additional [course handouts](./notes.html) can also be found on this site.

Instructor: [Michael Weylandt](https://michael-weylandt.com)
